title: Esports related stuff help
body: Who can i contact in regards to pro play/esports in oce? (hotmail)

replies.body:
What kind of thing are you looking for? 
Looking to join a team? Looking to speak to Rioters about their jobs? Looking to do your own tournament?
I'm a player in the Oceanic Challenger Series 2017 split 2, needing abit of help
Best person to talk to is your manager then and they will pass on your concern and help you seek answers.
Those contacts arent available anymore. Why are you making this so hard lol? I just had a question for someone from oce esports directory.
Because you got kicked and you want to complain unfair treatment?
Twitter DM [Ioatheypp](https://twitter.com/loatheypp) and she might be able to point you in the right direction
